    • Constructor Detail

      • StandardFastContext

        public StandardFastContext(ITemplates templates)
        Prepares the given set of templates for processing.
        • Resolves all remaining dictionary names by defaulting where needed.
        • Creating all required dictionaries and associating them with fields (ie calling the field's setDictionary method)
        • Resolving all template references to point to actual template instances.
        • Creates and populates templateRegisty.
        Parameters:
        templates - Templates to prepare for processing.

      • getTemplateIdentifierField

        public IField getTemplateIdentifierField()
        This just delegates to the underlying ITemplates object.

        I don't really want to expose the whole raw ITemplates object.

        Specified by:
        getTemplateIdentifierField in interface IFastContext
        Returns:

      • getTemplateSelector

        public ITemplateSelector getTemplateSelector()
                                      throws TemplateException
        This defaults to an instance of ConstantMessageTypeTemplateSelector using the default selector tag number of 35 (matching the FIX MsgType tag value).
        Specified by:
        getTemplateSelector in interface IFastContext
        Returns:
        ITemplateSelector - never returns null.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if default template selector is being used and it is not suitable for the templates associated with this context.

      • optimizeField

        public static RuntimeInstruction optimizeField(IField fld)
        Return an optimized RuntimeInstruction associated with the given field.

        If you write new special purpose runtime instructions, optimized for certain kinds of FAST field definitions, this where you plug them in.

        Parameters:
        fld - Field which forms basis of the returned RuntimeInstruction
        Returns:
        RuntimeInstruction based on given field.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • setTemplateSelector

        public void setTemplateSelector(ITemplateSelector templateSelector)
                         throws TemplateException
        Use this to change the default template selector if it is not suitable.
        Parameters:
        templateSelector - New ITemplateSelector.
        Throws:
        TemplateException - if the the given selector is not suitable for the templates associated with this context.
        See Also:
        getTemplateSelector()
